The Hindi: language text on the photo translates to English as: “This man walked three kilometers holding his horse on his back after it was bitten by a snake, carrying it to hospital to save the animal’s life.”
The image was shared on multiple Faceboo: 4. A reverse image search found that the photo was originally published on the UK daily The Sun website on November 27, 2017, in a report about Ukrainian weightlifter Dmytro Khaladzhi, who performs extraordinary feats of strength.
